participant_1.background:
I'm a single mom working two jobs to support my children.
I love working out with music to help push myself.
I pretended to be asleep when the cop approached my car.
i have a dog and we go for walks.
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy the sensation of my back being scratched, but not saliva.
i am a huge buffalo bills fan , and our family has season tickets.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
i am a hopeless romantic.
I remember playing with my pet fox in the backyard when I was a child.

content.text: Hey! I'm a single mom trying to support my kids with two jobs. What do you do for work?
I own a small farm where I herd cattle. I'm also a huge Buffalo Bills fan and we have season tickets.
Wow, that's really cool! I bet your kids love going to the games with you.
They do! They're both big fans too. What do you like to do for fun?
I love writing and working out. I also have a dog that I take on walks.
I enjoy the sensation of my back being scratched, but not saliva. What do you think of that?
That's interesting. I've never heard of anyone being like that before.
Yeah, it's not very common. I'm also a hopeless romantic.
That's sweet! I'm a hopeless romantic too.
We should hang out sometime! I bet we'd get along great.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to meet you and your family.
Great! I'll send you my number and we can set something up.
